content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), and (39.0,-85.0)
- Collection chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), and (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) for coal movement

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-58 to -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0,-61.0)
- Input chest at position (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-27.0,-58.0)
- Output chest at position (-24.5,-58.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), and (-5.5,-57.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (-6.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-56.5), (-4.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-56.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line at position(x=0 to 8, y=-2 to 4)
Consists of following entities:
- Four stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at positions (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), and (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at positions (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), and (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output at positions (0.5,-1.5), (2.5,-1.5), (4.5,-1.5), (6.5,-1.5), (0.5,1.5), (2.5,1.5), (4.5,1.5), (6.5,1.5)

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3 to 4, y=17 to 27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at position (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at position (4.5,20.5)
- Connected by pipe network
- Electric poles at positions (11.5,20.5) and (7.5,20.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain power generation
- Ensure mining drills and inserters have sufficient fuel to operate continuously

### Belt Blockage Issues
- Clear blocked transport belts at positions (4.5,4.5) and (6.5,4.5) to allow proper item flow
- Monitor belt systems for backups and clear as needed

### Inserter Placement and Operation
- Ensure inserters have both valid pickup and drop-off points
- Verify proper alignment between inserters and target containers/belts

### Space Management
- Check for adequate clearance when placing new structures
- Ensure output paths are clear before items are produced
